dk.jakobhandersen.multiregionexporterforcubase

Class WaveformGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • dk.jakobhandersen.multiregionexporterforcubase.WaveformGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class WaveformGenerator
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class based on Thread that handles the reading of waveform data. Uses FFMPEG to generate png file
    Author:
    Jakob Hougaard Andersen
